data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: What I can see from the picture is that there is an adult woman who wears a green long-sleeved top and a pair of blue jeans standing at the corner of the room. She is looking through the window as if there is something interesting happening outside the room. From the look of the room, we can tell that she was trying to clean up the mess on the floor with a red broom. Apparently, someone had broken the vase, leaving the plant, soil, and debris all over the floor. In the room, there are a small round table and two chairs which had been moved against the wall to make space for the cleaning process. On the yellow wall, there are some stickers and car plates. (127字)
